DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read attack simulation data of an organization
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read attack simulation and training data for an organization for the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read attack simulation data of an organization
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read attack simulation and training data for an organization on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read attack simulation data of an organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read attack simulation and training data for an organization without a signed-in user.
